did.abstract: Letters written while Hightower was a student at Randolph-Macon College, Boydton, Virginia, 1859-1860, and while serving in the Confederate Army. The majority of the collection concerns Hightower's college life, but his Civil War letters discuss various skirmishes under Stonewall Jackson's command.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: William A. Hightower was a college student and Confederate soldier, from Halifax County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Letters written while Hightower was a student at Randolph-Macon College, Boydton, Virginia, 1859-1860, and while serving in the Confederate Army. The majority of the collection concerns Hightower's college life, but his Civil War letters discuss various skirmishes under Stonewall Jackson's command.
